verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye shall be \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add am\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.

¶ Ye shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ \w Turn|strong="H6437"\w* ye not unto \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*, nor \w make|strong="H6213"\w* to yourselves \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And if ye \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye shall \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* it at your own \w will|strong="H7522"\w*.

It shall be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* ye \w offer|strong="H2077"\w* it, and on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*: and if ought \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* until the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, it shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And if it be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* at \w all|strong="H0398"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, it \add is\add* \w abominable|strong="H6292"\w*; it shall not be \w accepted|strong="H7521"\w*.

Therefore \add every one\add* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* it shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, because he hath \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* the hallowed \w thing|strong="H6944"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from among his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ And when ye \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* of your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, thou shalt not wholly \w reap|strong="H3615"\w* the \w corners|strong="H6285"\w* of thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, neither shalt thou \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* the \w gleanings|strong="H3951"\w* of thy \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

And thou shalt not \w glean|strong="H5953"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, neither shalt thou \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \add every\add* \w grape|strong="H6528"\w* of thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*; thou shalt \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* them for the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
¶ Ye shall not \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*, neither deal \w falsely|strong="H3584"\w*, neither \w lie|strong="H8266"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H5997"\w*.

¶ And ye shall not \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*, neither shalt thou \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Thou shalt not \w defraud|strong="H6231"\w* thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, neither \w rob|strong="H1497"\w* \add him:\add* the \w wages|strong="H6468"\w* of him that is \w hired|strong="H7916"\w* shall not \w abide|strong="H3885"\w* with thee all night until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt not \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* the \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*, nor \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w stumblingblock|strong="H4383"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, but shalt \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w unrighteousness|strong="H5766"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: thou shalt not \w respect|strong="H5375"\w* the \w person|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, nor \w honour|strong="H1921"\w* the \w person|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w*: \add but\add* in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* shalt thou \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thy \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* up and down \add as\add* a \w talebearer|strong="H7400"\w* among thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: neither shalt thou \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* against the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Thou shalt not \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: thou shalt in any \w wise|strong="H3198"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* thy \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*, and not \w suffer|strong="H5375"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* upon him.\f + \fr 19.17 \ft and…: or, that thou bear not sin for him\f*

¶ Thou shalt not \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w*, nor bear any \w grudge|strong="H5201"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, but thou shalt \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* as \w thyself|strong="H3644"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*. Thou shalt not let thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* \w gender|strong="H7250"\w* with a diverse \w kind|strong="H3610"\w*: thou shalt not \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w* with mingled \w seed|strong="H3610"\w*: neither shall a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* \w mingled|strong="H3610"\w* of linen and \w woollen|strong="H8162"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* upon thee.

¶ And \w whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* \w carnally|strong="H2233"\w* with a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, that \add is\add* a \w bondmaid|strong="H8198"\w*, \w betrothed|strong="H2778"\w* to an \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, and not at \w all|strong="H6299"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w*, nor \w freedom|strong="H2668"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* her; she shall be \w scourged|strong="H1244"\w*; they shall not be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, because she was not \w free|strong="H2666"\w*.\f + \fr 19.20 \ft betrothed…: or, abused by any: Heb. reproached by (or, for) man\f*\f + \fr 19.20 \ft she shall…: or, they, etc: Heb. there shall be a scourging\f*

And he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* his trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, \add even\add* a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* for a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him with the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* which he hath \w done|strong="H2398"\w*: and the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* which he hath \w done|strong="H2398"\w* shall be \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* him.

¶ And when ye shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and shall have \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* all manner of \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* for \w food|strong="H3978"\w*, then ye shall \w count|strong="H6188"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof as \w uncircumcised|strong="H6188"\w*: \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* shall it be as \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* unto you: it shall not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* of.

But in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* all the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* to \w praise|strong="H1974"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add withal\add*.\f + \fr 19.24 \ft holy…: Heb. holiness of praises to the \+nd LORD\+nd*\f*

And in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof, that it may \w yield|strong="H3254"\w* unto you the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* thereof: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
¶ Ye shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add any thing\add* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: neither shall ye use \w enchantment|strong="H5172"\w*, nor observe \w times|strong="H6049"\w*.

Ye shall not \w round|strong="H5362"\w* the \w corners|strong="H6285"\w* of your \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, neither shalt thou \w mar|strong="H7843"\w* the \w corners|strong="H6285"\w* of thy \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*.

Ye shall not \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H3793"\w* \w cuttings|strong="H8296"\w* in your \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* for the \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*, nor \w print|strong="H5414"\w* any \w marks|strong="H7085"\w* upon you: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Do not \w prostitute|strong="H2490"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, to cause her to be a \w whore|strong="H2181"\w*; lest the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* fall to \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* become \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w*.\f + \fr 19.29 \ft prostitute: Heb. profane\f*
¶ Ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and \w reverence|strong="H3372"\w* my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ \w Regard|strong="H6437"\w* not them that have familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w*, neither \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after \w wizards|strong="H3049"\w*, to be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* by them: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the hoary \w head|strong="H7872"\w*, and \w honour|strong="H1921"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the old \w man|strong="H2205"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
¶ And if a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* with thee in your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, ye shall not \w vex|strong="H3238"\w* him.\f + \fr 19.33 \ft vex: or, oppress\f*

\add But\add* the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w dwelleth|strong="H1481"\w* with you shall be unto you as one \w born|strong="H0249"\w* among you, and thou shalt \w love|strong="H0157"\w* him as thyself; for ye were \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w unrighteousness|strong="H5766"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, in \w meteyard|strong="H4060"\w*, in \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*, or in \w measure|strong="H4884"\w*.

\w Just|strong="H6664"\w* \w balances|strong="H3976"\w*, \w just|strong="H6664"\w* \w weights|strong="H0068"\w*, a \w just|strong="H6664"\w* \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*, and a \w just|strong="H6664"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w*, shall ye have: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which brought you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 19.36 \ft weights: Heb. stones\f*

Therefore shall ye \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* all my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and all my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
